testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access detailed information about the course price plan with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with valid authorization credentials and the correct (id) is sent to the /api/pricePlan/{id}
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/pricePlan/31" path parameters......................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies the contents of 31, 864, 2003, 1719792000, 1722384000, 25, 55, 1625299801, 4, 31, "en" and "First Price Plan" in the response body's data..passed

testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access detailed information about the course price plan with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with valid authorization credentials and the correct (id) is sent to the /api/pricePlan/{id} 2
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/pricePlan/28" path parameters......................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies the contents of 28, 1015, 1998, 1727740800, 1730246400, 35, 20, 1624965807, 1, 28, "en" and "Golden Offer" in the response body's data..passed
